item.patchouli.industrial_revolution_boo: 本書將幫助你了解本模組的一些重要方面。$(br2)如果你發現任何問題、疑問或建議，請在$(l:https://github.com/GabrielOlvH/Industrial-Revolution/issues)GitHub$()上提出問題，或加入我們的$(l:https://discord.com/invite/G4PjhEf)Discord！$()$(br2)謝謝你的遊玩！。
block.indrev.miner.tooltip: You must use a Chunk Scanner in this chunk before using the miner
block.indrev.charge_pad_mk4.tooltip: Charges equipped items or anything you put in it!
item.indrev.speed_upgrade.tooltip: Increases processing speed and power consumption
item.indrev.blast_furnace_upgrade.toolti: Allows the Electric Furnace to accept Blast Furnace recipes
item.indrev.smoker_upgrade.tooltip: Allows Electric Furnace to accept Smoker recipes
item.indrev.upgrades.incompatible: This machine does not support this enhancer
item.indrev.upgrades.count: Limited by %s per slot by the machine
item.indrev.chunk_scanner.already_scanne: This chunk is already scanned and it has a %s vein
item.indrev.chunk_scanner.tooltip1: Hold right click to start scanning this chunk
item.indrev.wrench.title: Configure Machine
item.indrev.wrench.tooltip: Shift + Right Click to change mode
gui.indrev.heatgen.title: Consuming %s mB
gui.indrev.guide_book_shortcut.contains: Opens about page on the Revolutionary Guide
indrev.category.rei.upgrading: You must craft a %s and use it on a %s to upgrade it to %s
item.indrev.module_protection.tooltip: Increases the Protection provided by the armor
item.indrev.module_feather_falling.toolt: Fall damage is negated at cost of energy.
item.indrev.module_speed.tooltip: Gives you Speed effect at cost of energy.
item.indrev.module_jump_boost.tooltip: Gives you Jump Boost effect at cost of energy.
item.indrev.module_night_vision.tooltip: Gives you Night Vision effect at cost of energy.
item.indrev.module_breathing.tooltip: Gives you Breathing effect when underwater at cost of energy.
item.indrev.module_auto_feeder.tooltip: Eats food from your inventory automatically at cost of energy.
item.indrev.module_charger.tooltip: Recharges any items in your inventory (does not include armor).
item.indrev.module_solar_panel.tooltip: Recharges your armor and held item when under sunlight.
item.indrev.module_piglin_tricker.toolti: Tricks Piglins into thinking you are wearing gold.
item.indrev.module_fire_resistance.toolt: Gives you Fire Resistance effect at cost of energy.
item.indrev.module_efficiency.tooltip: Increases the speed of your mining tool.
item.indrev.module_range.tooltip: Increases the Range of blocks your Drill can break at once.
item.indrev.module_silk_touch.tooltip: Behaves like a Silk Touch enchantment.
item.indrev.module_fire_aspect.tooltip: Behaves like a Fire Aspect enchantment.
text.autoconfig.indrev.title: 工業革命
text.autoconfig.indrev.option.compatibil: This mod id will make the recipes attempt to output items such as dusts and plates of the target mod.
advancements.indrev.basic_solar_generato: 取得一個基礎太陽能發電機
advancements.indrev.advanced_solar_gener: 取得一個高級太陽能發電機
advancements.indrev.biomass_generator.de: 取得一個生物質發電機

Get a Lazuli Flux Container MK2
Get a Lazuli Flux Container MK3
Get a Lazuli Flux Container MK4
advancements.indrev.modular_workbench: It does not look like a workbench
advancements.indrev.modular_armor.descri: Get a Modular Armor full set
gui.indrev.tip_0: Make sure to configure fluid and item input and output
gui.indrev.tip_1: Do not use cables above the input limit
gui.indrev.tip_2: Use coolers like a cool guy
gui.indrev.tip_3: Use coolers to never loose efficiency
gui.indrev.tip_5: You should check out the Modular Armor
gui.indrev.tip_6: Real gamers use the Gamer Axe
gui.indrev.tip_7: If you have issues or suggestions join our Discord!
gui.indrev.tip_8: Always backup your worlds before updating
death.attack.acid.player: %s was dissolved in sulfuric acid while trying to escape %s
